attributes.action: Compulsory to spell people's names correctly otherwise you must pay a £10 fine!
attributes.background: Mine and many other names are spelt in correctly, especially as our countries are now becoming multi cultural. This can offend people so I believe that you should always ask how to spell the persons name!

rejection.details: In any case, we couldn't accept your petition because it's not clear what specific action you want the Government or Parliament to take.
